title: Home Network Testing
content:
I am doing some testing / base lining of my home network in preparation for replacing my home router this weekend. Here is a test result using http://ift.tt/1IlNdPa at the living room table on a 5Ghz network.


 


Here is the same test at 2.4GHz:


 


So, I have slightly faster speeds at 5GHz although the WiFi signal is not as strong. According to Wi-Fi analyzer, the 2.4GHz network is slightlight lower dBm than the 5GHz. 
				


from Notes http://ift.tt/1VD2aBv

via IFTTT
